title: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add a switch to enable dark theme across the app.

reasoning.roi: Improves user experience and accessibility, potentially increasing user engagement.
reasoning.effort: Relatively straightforward implementation with existing UI components.
reasoning.alignment: Aligns with our focus on enhancing user experience and accessibility.
reasoning.risk: Low risk of implementation issues or negative user impact.

explanation: Good ROI with moderate effort and alignment.  Worth considering for the next sprint.

title: AI-Powered Search
description: Implement semantic search with NLP to improve query results.

reasoning.roi: Significantly improves search accuracy and relevance, leading to better user satisfaction and potentially increased conversions.
reasoning.effort: Requires significant development effort, including NLP model integration and data processing.
reasoning.alignment: Strongly aligns with our strategic focus on leveraging AI to enhance core product functionality.
reasoning.risk: Higher risk due to complexity of NLP integration and potential performance issues.

explanation: High potential ROI and strong strategic alignment, but requires significant effort and carries higher risk.  Should be considered for a future roadmap.
